Sentencas: Nanopowders of B0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3 (BSCF) were synthesized by glycine-nitrate process using glycine and metal nitrates as the starting materials.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: The structural and morphological properties of BSCF powders were characterized by SEM, XRD and EDS.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Results showed that microstructure of as-prepared powders was porous and their size was less than 20 nm.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: Pure perovskite phase was completely formed after heat treatment at 850 degrees C for 2 h in the air.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: All of above characteristics were very beneficial for IT-SOFC cathode.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: G/n molar ratios played an important role in the process.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: With increasing g/n molar ratio, flame temperature increased subsequently and size of as-prepared powders increased too.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: G/n molar ratios influenced pores distribution through reaction intensity.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode

Sentencas: When g/n molar ratio was 0.56, distribution of pores in as-prepared aggregates was the most uniform.
Titulo: Ba0.5Sr0.5CO0.8Fe0.2O3 nanopowders prepared by glycine-nitrate process for solid oxide fuel cell cathode
